title: Amenities not available in the periphery of 400 m
clause_text: Amenities not available in the periphery of 400 m. from boundaries of URC shall be developed on Amenity Plot, subject to the minimum area specified for such amenities under this Regulation and handed over free of cost to the Corporation without any consideration. Area to be excluded from computation of FSI shall be as per these Regulations (UDCPR).
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements â€“
